common.name: squeezeboxrpc

1.0.1.en: * change setstate/createobject logic * fix role and type for Mode-state * update tests * update dependency versions * improve io-package.json

0.8.32.en: the adapter function iobroker.deleteChannel didnt works as expected. it didnt delete the whole subtree of states. now i implement my own delete function

0.8.30.en: change from the issue of the adapter checker

0.8.29.en: optimize handling of player state power and connected

0.8.28.en: add advanced signaling function with telnet and fix some more authorization issues with LMS
